sen.j: 吉山 明兆（きつさん みんちょう、正平 (日本)7年/文和元年（1352年） － 永享3年8月20日 (旧暦)（1431年9月26日））は、室町時代前・中期の画僧。
sen.e: Mincho KICHIZAN (1352 - 26th September 1431) was an artist monk who lived during the early/mid-Muromachi period.

Mincho KITSUSAN (1352 - 5 October,1431) was an artist monk during the early and middle Muromachi period.

sen.j: 臨済宗の東福寺に入り、大道一以の画法を学んだ。
sen.e: He entered the Rinzai Sect temple Tofuku-ji where he studied the painting style of Daido Ichii.
He entered the Rinzai Sect temple Tofuku-ji where he studied the painting style of Daido Ichii.
He entered Tofuku-ji Temple of the Rinzai Sect where he studied the painting style of Daido Ichii.

sen.j: 周囲からは禅僧として高位の位を望まれたが、画を好む明兆はこれを拒絶して明の李竜眠から画法を学び、初の寺院専属の画家として大成した。
sen.e: The monks with whom he associated wished make him a high ranking Zen monk but his passion was painting, so he refused this in order to study art under LI Longmian of Ming Dynasty China, and went on to find success as the first temple artist.

sen.e: 4th shogun, Yoshimochi ASHIKAGA, was extremely fond of his style.

sen.j: 僧としての位は終生、仏殿の管理を務める殿主（でんす）の位にあったので、兆殿主と称された。
sen.e: He held the Buddhist monk rank of Densu (responsible for managing the Buddha hall) for his entire life, so is known as "Cho Densu".
